title: Showers with seating area, Full size washer and dryer connections

posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 1', 'OR Text', '1', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1230 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Situated in the tranquil, tree-lined Village East Neighborhood in the vibrant On Havana Street district, Centro is the ideal place to come home to.', 'Just minutes from the Denver Tech Center, Cherry Creek and Lowry, this garden-style apartment community is accented with open-air plazas, beautifully planned green spaces and amenities you soon won’t be able to live without.', 'Easy access to Denver makes commuting a breeze, but don’t worry about having to go far for shopping and dining.', 'An abundance of stores and restaurants, including Sprouts Farmers Market, SuperTarget, Petco, Starbucks, Noodles & Co., and more, are within walking distance.', 'Plus, we’re in the Cherry Creek School District — one of the highest-achieving school districts in the state.', 'Centro offers one-, two- and three-bedroom floor plans, and custom two-level townhome-style apartments with attached garages.', 'Our apartment homes boast eco-friendly designs accented by elevated finishes, such as granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, wood-style flooring and extra-deep sinks.', 'Centro residents enjoy our luxe community amenities, including a well-appointed fitness center, decadent resort-style pool, custom fire pits and convenient grilling stations.', 'Come home to Centro.', 'Features:', 'Storage facilities available, Gooseneck faucet with pull down spray, Luxurious, oversized oval garden tubs, Stylish 2" wood style blinds, Dramatic nine-foot ceilings, Designer 42" slab style cabinetry with contemporary bar pulls, Wood grain and satin nickel ceiling fans with lights, Contemporary brushed chrome track lighting and under cabinet lighting, Plush wall-to-wall carpeting, Upscale GE Stainless appliance package, Full size washer and dryer connections, Showers with seating area, Curved shower rods, Extra deep sink with disposal, Granite Countertops, Abundant closet space, Comcast and Century Link available, Private balconies and patios with storage closet Balconies with exterior storage, Attached and Detached Garages, Pristine ceramic tile tub and shower surrounds, Wood grain and satin nickel ceiling fans with lights, Island Kitchens*, Wood style flooring, Two handle high arc faucets and porcelain sinks', '*select homes', 'Community Amenities:', 'State of the art fitness center, Raised fire pit and BBQ grilling stations, Next to Gardens on landscaped green spaces, Club area flat screen televisions and gourmet kitchen w/ Coffee Bar, Complementary Wi-Fi in clubhouse and pool deck', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, contact for details.', 'More
